data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_f18e45a9a4cb45897e1f614593ff4497.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
With his Basic Attacks resonated with the Abyss Power within his body, Brody is able to move while winding up his Basic Attacks (which will be interrupted when casting skills), at the cost of having longer Basic Attack Animation and lower Attack Speed Bonus. Each Basic Attack deals <font color="fba51f"> (+140% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="ffe63c">(+45*Hero Level)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> (of which the damage scaling with level cannot be critical), increases Movement Speed by 30% (which will decay rapidly in 1.2s), and applies 1 stack of <font color="a6aafb">Abyss Mark</font> on the enemy, capped at 4 stacks.
Each stack of <font color="a6aafb">Abyss Mark</font> increases Brody's damage against the target by 5% and his Movement Speed by 5%.

Brody launches a shock wave in the designated direction, dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+170% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>, slowing the enemies by 30% for 1.2s, and applying 1 stack of <font color="a6aafb">Abyss Mark</font>.

As the shock wave travels, for each enemy it hits, it deals an extra 10% damage, inflicts extra 5% slow effect, and applies an additional stack of <font color="a6aafb">Abyss Mark</font>, capped at 130% damage, 45% slow effect, and 4 stacks. This skill deals only 80% damage to Minions.

Brody dashes to an enemy, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the target, stunning the target for 0.8s, and applying 1 stack of <font color="a6aafb">Abyss Mark</font> on the target.
Upon hitting the target, he is able to move one more time in the movement direction, gaining 45% Movement Speed that will decay rapidly in 1.2s.

Brody locks on all the targets within 8 unit(s), dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+165% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to them. If the target has an <font color="a6aafb">Abyss Mark</font>, all <font color="a6aafb">Abyss Marks</font> will be reset, dealing <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> equal to 136<font color="fba51f"> (+72% Extra Physical Attack)</font> plus 4% of the target's lost HP for each stack the target has.

data.name: Brody

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
After killing an enemy hero, instantly recover 15% of Lost HP and gain 20% Movement Speed.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 3s</font>.

After killing an enemy hero, instantly recover 15% of Lost HP and gain 20% Movement Speed.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 3s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+18 Extra Magic Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+70 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP

equiplist.equipskill1: Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
equiplist.equipskill2: Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equiptips: +60 Extra Physical Attack

equiplist.equipskill1: Wind Chant: Immune to all Physical Damage
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Wind Chant: Immune to all Physical Damage
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+10% Lifesteal

equiplist.equipskill1: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).
equiplist.equiptips:
+160 Extra Physical Attack
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense

recommendmasterplan.name: ARH
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: Mysterious man whose right hand was corroded and who lost his memory.

assist.desc: Brody works best with heroes who can perform lock-on attacks or heroes with area CC abilities, as they can give Brody more room to deal damage and farm better. Such as Hylos and Minsitthar.

strong.desc: Brody is strong against heroes with poor survivability in the early game and heroes without dash, because he can easily lock on them and attack beyond their reach. Like Aamon and Yin.

weak.desc: Brody is countered by heroes with CC immunity and multiple movement abilities, because they can quickly close in on Brody, giving him no chance to stack the Abyss Mark. Such as Martis and Wanwan.
